root.name: Castlevania II: Belmont's Revenge
root.description: Overview Castlevania II: Belmont's Revenge (not to be confused with Castlevania II: Simon's Quest) (known in Japan as Dracula Densetsu II, translated to Dracula Legends II) is an action horror platformer developed and published by Konami for the Game Boy in August 1991. The sequel to Castlevania: The Adventure, Castlevania II: Belmont's Revenge re-adds the traditional sub-weapon system. Similar to the original Mega Man games, this game allows the player to play the four initial stages in any order.Â Set 15 years after vampire hunter Christopher Belmont defeats Count Dracula, Dracula returns and kidnaps Christopher's son, Soleiyu. The forces of darkness transforms Soleiyu into a demon, which aids Dracula's resurrection into human form. Players control Christopher as he travels through five castles in order to confront Dracula and rescue his son.
